name: image-background-remover
title: Image Background Remover
description: Remove backgrounds from images using AI-powered background removal
content:
Overview

This application removes backgrounds from images using AI-powered background removal. Built using rembg, it provides high-quality background removal with transparent output.

Features

  • AI-powered background removal using deep learning
  • Optional alpha matting for better edge quality
  • Support for PNG and WebP output with transparency
  • Works with various image types (portraits, products, etc.)
  • Automatic handling of complex edges and hair

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Alpha Matting: Enable for better edge quality (slower but more accurate)
  • Output Format: Select PNG or WebP (both support transparency)
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates an image with transparent background, saved with '_no_bg' suffix.

Use Cases

  • Creating product images for e-commerce
  • Preparing images for graphic design
  • Removing backgrounds from profile pictures
  • Creating images with transparent backgrounds for overlays
  • Batch processing images for consistent backgrounds
